txt.en: 'That ought to raise the reputation of Mâr Naphra. The fewer of these filthy creatures roaming about the vicinity, the better.\n\n'Of course, a reward for honest work!'

'You seen them nasty creatures out in the bogs to the north? Filthy. Disgusting.

'Takes away from our most reputable establishment, wouldn't you agree? I'm looking for strong folk such as you to clear them out. They're gettin' aggressive and we can't have them roaming about causing the most prestigious clientele discomfort.

'Do what you can, eh?'
Erothai has asked you to clean up the bogs to the north so that Mâr Naphra maintains such a high status as an establishment.
Erothai is concerned that the bog-lurkers are becoming more aggressive, heightening the threat of attacks on Mâr Naphra.
You've done all you can to clear the bogs. You should talk to Erothai and give your full report.\n\nErothai can be found in Mâr Naphra.
